tooltip.mobile: Double tap on a cell to edit the content. Hold tap on a row to delete it or insert another one.
tooltip.web: Double click on a cell to edit the content. Right click on a row to delete it or insert another one.

subjects.name: Subject Name
subjects.id_tooltip: Subject ID is a shortname of the subject to make it easier to be referenced in Schedules table

schedules.is_practical_tooltip: Some weeks have classes but not practical ones
